sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Shield of the Righteous deals 10% increased damage and grants 3% damage reduction.
Set: Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing you deal during your next Avenging Wrath by 0.5%. This effect stacks.

spells.description: Use: Gain 4,306 Parry and 3,062 Avoidance for 6 sec, after which you emit a shockwave in front of you that deals 70,663 Physical damage. (30 Sec Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Shield of the Righteous deals 10% increased damage and grants 3% damage reduction.
Set: Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing you deal during your next Avenging Wrath by 0.5%. This effect stacks.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks and abilities have a high chance to summon a scarab that retrieves a fortifying chunk of flesh from your target. Scarabs deal 11,764 Physical damage and reduce your damage taken by 50% until 293,996 damage has been prevented.
Use: Send your swarm into a frenzy, summoning 12 scarabs over 3 sec to ravage your foes. The number of scarabs is increased by your Haste. (1 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Strength by 2,029, up to 10,145.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.4 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Use: Teleports the caster to Orgrimmar. (2 Hr Cooldown)

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
